welcome_message_body: Welcome to Wanggezhuang, China! Known for its beautiful traditional architecture and rich cultural heritage, we invite you to explore our charming city and enjoy all it has to offer.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Nanyuan Airport, serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The international terminal at Nanyuan Airport, serving international flights.

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network for a limited amount of time.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Beijing Capital International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Beijing Capital International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Beijing Capital International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Simply connect to the network and enter your phone number to receive a verification code.
